titles.title: A resolution relating to tax information disclosures to the Select Committee on Secret Military Assistance to Iran and the Nicaraguan Opposition.

action.text: Submitted in the Senate and held at the desk by unanimous consent. Until the close of business March 13, 1987.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 3/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Select Committee on Secret Military Assistance to Iran and the Nicaraguan Opposition to inspect and receive for tax years 1980 to 1987 any tax return, return information, or other tax related material relating to: (1) the National Endowment for the Preservation of Liberty; (2) the American Conservative Trust; (3) the National Defense Council; (4) the Institute for Democracy, Education and Assistance; (5) the International Youth Committee; (6) the Gulf and Caribbean Foundation; (7) the Nicaraguan Freedom Fund; (8) the Institute for North-South Issues; and (9) any officers of such organizations.
